amendment.description: To amend the assistance to local educational agencies with significant enrollment changes in military dependent students due to force structure changes, troop relocations, creation of new units, and realignment under BRAC.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 1348 withdrawn in Senate.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

Amendment SA 1348 proposed by Senator Murray. (consideration: CR S8801-8802; text: CR S8801-8802) To amend the assistance to local educational agencies with significant enrollment changes in military dependent students due to force structure changes, troop relocations, creation of new units, and realignment under BRAC.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1348 proposed by Senator Murray.
